name: typescriptjwtvalidator
description: JSON Web Tokens (JWT) are used as a way to verify the identity of the caller of an API. **The best way to verify a JWT is to use a verification library.** I wanted to have a look at some of what those libraries are doing under the hood by putting together a function that will return if a given token is valid. In this blog I'll go through what I have done to get a validation function working.
